property.name: Text Box
property.value: Your face-down Dynasty cards in play are Holdings with the trait, "Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold." Twice per turn, after your Dynasty Phase begins: You may pay 2 Gold; if you did, turn a card in your province face-down (if needed) and put it into play bowed. Limited: Gain 2 Honor. You may not declare an attack. Battle: Even if this card is bowed, discard a card and target a Personality: Give him +2F or -2F.
